title: Can't login today (3/14/17)
body: I haven't been able to login on both clients

replies.body: Exact same problem. In AZ w/ Cox and unable to log in for the last 5+ hours

You might be impacted by the current issue we're investigating.  More specifically, players with Cox as their ISP have been reporting connection and login problems in some areas of Arizona this evening.  Check your area's ISP site too for info if it's available, otherwise I'll share any updates as they get to me.  Hang tight!
Same here believe it or not. It just says there's an error. I've been like afk-playing a game while waiting for the thing to finally work.
Did we ever find a fix? My buddy and I are from Arizona and we have the same problem.
No it's a problem with cox, you can call them if you want to see when they will have it fixed but as of right now it hasn't been fixed.

I'm in the same boat. Been unable to log in for 5 hours now. Keep checking the "Service Status" page and everything says it's working, but I've tried both clients and they won't Authenticate.

I get that things go wrong once in a while, but when they don't even put out notices that there are issues and they are being worked on, that's a bit annoying.
Ok, good to know. My isp is cox and im in arizona so guess that's what's going on. Not much I can do about it I guess.
